rows.label: qev050602_MSG0001
rows.name: You have come. Good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050602_MSG0002
rows.name:
Perhaps you will indulge us in talk before we spar?
I would share a bit about us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050602_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev050602_SEL0011
rows.name: Nod wordlessly.

rows.label: qev050602_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev050602_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Da Naguth that the time for talk has passed.

rows.label: qev050602_MSG0003
rows.name:
Had the queen jacul struck our base in Cauldros any
other day, we three would have been defending it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050602_MSG0004
rows.name:
But the Ganglion ordered us to depart so that we might
attack their enemies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050602_MSG0005
rows.name:
We faced soldiers that day, yes, but also defenseless
civilians. None survived. It was...disquieting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050602_MSG0006
rows.name:
And at the end of that horrific job, we returned back
to base only to find our parents, the general's son,
and many others gone. Devoured by that demon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050602_MSG0007
rows.name:
The three of us felt certain that our crimes against the
innocent had been meted out on our own loved ones
in return.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050602_MSG0008
rows.name:
And so we swore that this was one battle we would
fight together...and alone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050602_MSG0009
rows.name:
I wish you no ill, but you will suffer injuries here that
will prevent you from joining this hunt![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050602_MSG0010
rows.name:
Hmm. I see you are as direct and passionate a fighter
as Da Zeulbe. I respect that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050602_MSG0011
rows.name: I shall waste no more of your time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050602_MSG0012
rows.name:
Rest assured, we will not take your life. But you will not
leave this place in fit condition to join our hunt![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050602_MSG0013
rows.name: Da Girhi! Da Zeulbe! Are you ready?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050602_MSG0014
rows.name:
I will strike down our opponent with the speed and fury
of thunder![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050602_MSG0015
rows.name:
I will crush stone and bone alike with the weight of my
mighty blows![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050602_MSG0016
rows.name:
And I will overwhelm you with the grace and swiftness
of the wind, for the Three Talons are invincible!
Now...en garde![ST:wait ]
